00020 #include "BoxROIExtractor.h"
00021 #include "brics_3d/core/HomogeneousMatrix44.h"
00022 
00023 namespace brics_3d {
00024 
00025 BoxROIExtractor::BoxROIExtractor() {
00026         this->sizeX = 1.0;
00027         this->sizeY = 1.0;
00028         this->sizeZ = 1.0;
00029 }
00030 
00031 BoxROIExtractor::BoxROIExtractor(Coordinate sizeX, Coordinate sizeY, Coordinate sizeZ) {
00032         this->sizeX = sizeX;
00033         this->sizeY = sizeY;
00034         this->sizeZ = sizeZ;
00035 }
00036 
00037 BoxROIExtractor::~BoxROIExtractor() {
00038 
00039 }
00040 
00041 void BoxROIExtractor::filter(PointCloud3D* originalPointCloud, PointCloud3D* resultPointCloud) {
00042         if (boxOrigin == 0 || boxOrigin->isIdentity()) { //lazy evaluation...
00043                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < originalPointCloud->getSize(); ++i) {
00044                         Point3D tmpPoint = (*originalPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i];
00045                         if (tmpPoint.getX() >= -sizeX/2 && tmpPoint.getX() <= sizeX/2 &&
00046                                         tmpPoint.getY() >= -sizeY/2 && tmpPoint.getY() <= sizeY/2 &&
00047                                         tmpPoint.getZ() >= -sizeZ/2 && tmpPoint.getZ() <= sizeZ/2) {
00048                                 resultPointCloud->addPointPtr((*originalPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].clone());
00049                         }
00050                 }
00051         } else {
00052                 HomogeneousMatrix44* inverseOrigin = new HomogeneousMatrix44();
00053                 *inverseOrigin = *(boxOrigin.get());
00054                 inverseOrigin->inverse();
00055                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < originalPointCloud->getSize(); ++i) {
00056                         Point3D tmpPoint = (*originalPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i];
00057                         tmpPoint.homogeneousTransformation(inverseOrigin); // move all points to the origin and then compare
00058                         if (tmpPoint.getX() >= -sizeX/2 && tmpPoint.getX() <= sizeX/2 &&
00059                                         tmpPoint.getY() >= -sizeY/2 && tmpPoint.getY() <= sizeY/2 &&
00060                                         tmpPoint.getZ() >= -sizeZ/2 && tmpPoint.getZ() <= sizeZ/2) {
00061                                 resultPointCloud->addPointPtr((*originalPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].clone());
00062                         }
00063                 }
00064                 delete inverseOrigin;
00065         }
00066 }
00067 
00068 }  // namespace brics_3d
